Reviews.Title: “Central Location, Great Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Sharon00
Reviews.Content: definitely choice double absolutely huge bed comfortable hotel located close underground transport system location perfect easy access wonderful city eat breakfast cant comment food staff helpful little cold hotel amenities perfect sightseeing city break clean spacious rom comfortable bed hot shower suitable location definitely stay return berlin

Reviews.Title: “Great location....Great hotel”
Reviews.Author: banjoman1948
Reviews.Content: checkin checkout hotel exceeded expectations location perfect breakfast perfect staff rate included breakfast breakfast eggs scrambled hard boiled bacon fruit cereal coffee etc underground train 100 meters door berlin hard rock street resaurants arent shoppers stores money hop hop tour found worthwhile checkpoint charlie museum desperation era price paid 55 euro nite special 4 star hotel

Reviews.Title: “Great location,but definitely not a 4 star hotel!”

Reviews.Content: weve six days location ok partys holding party former communist house youth hostel 4 star hotel underground stations nearby walking distance truly helpful consider staying hotel renovation doesnt immediately banquet breakfast fantastic tasty besides tomatoes personnel helpful friendly smiling sense safety plus allowed earlier check check greatly appreciated kept eye luggages departure day help furthermore handed free copies berlin maps overall polite mean building hand steady smell carpets stains recommend hotel location especially planning city day travel suggested planning romantic getaway

Reviews.Content: hotel super convenient location airport bus outside excellent bus ubahn sbahn connections minute hotel believe hotel undergoing facelift standard ancient grotty wardrobe tired bathroom light 4star standard happened catch glance modern internet connection wireless network available lobby 5 euro day impressed breakfast sensational staff friendly helpful short location excellent breakfast friendly staff disappointing

Reviews.Title: “This is not a four star hotel !!”
Reviews.Author: John Y
Reviews.Content: hotel excellent location staff friendly helpful breakfasts lots choice corridors shabby overdue refurbishment definitely 4 standard hotel careful continues claim 4 status

Reviews.Title: “Good location, great breakfast, clean room, comfortable”
